payload.title: Portfolio python file
payload.tldr: Create a website to log my first year working remote.  What are my goals, weekly accomplishments and thoughts worth blogging about.
payload.body: Goal: Create Django Portfolio to replace the use of GitHub Pages for goals and weekly log
payload.progress: Goals App  ~~Uploading info through admin site will NOT happen.  How to do git push like operation?~~ This is called an API
